description.0: A floating device that can monitor certain phenomena. It was picked up and modified to serve other purposes following its abandonment.

0.0: ATK is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. When current HP increases or decreases, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>16%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>14%</cryo> for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the wielder has 3 stacks, ATK SPD will be increased by <cryo>8%</cryo>.

1.0: ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. When current HP increases or decreases, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>20%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>17.5%</cryo> for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the wielder has 3 stacks, ATK SPD will be increased by <cryo>10%</cryo>.
